description:
Step inside the Pitch Meeting that led to Venom: The Last Dance! 

Subscribe for more Pitch Meetings: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC9Kq-yEt1iYsbUzNOoIRK0g

Tom Hardy’s Venom was kind of a surprise hit, somehow convincing people to see a movie set in the Spider-Man world without giving them any Spider-Man. Naturally a sequel followed, and now a third movie has squeezed in to somehow make this a trilogy! All without ever seeing Spider-Man! 

So check out the pitch meeting that led to Venom: The Last Dance, to find out how it all came together!

Check Out These Other Videos:

The Acolyte Pitch Meeting
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PqwEE6G6zaU

Deadpool & Wolverine Pitch Meeting
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kUrT2UErII8

Our Website
http://screenrant.com/
title: Venom: The Last Dance Pitch Meeting
